स्तरास्तिरास्तिराद्यागम प्रद्धारेशन्तिक Settlement deed written by the late Karrikottipalli son (65 years) of Undrajavaram village, Undrajavaram mandal, Godavari district. You are my eldest son. In return for the love I have for you, I have chosen to transfer the property in the schedule below to me, Sri Tanuku S.R., in his office, 1st 4th book 1415th volume 105 pages 107, as number 2177, dated 1-8-1988, as per the sale deed registered by the Registrar, which has become my own property and has become my full right to the property from the date of its transfer to me. I hereby grant you 113 sq.m. of vacant land towards the north out of 252 sq.m. of land with all the rights of sale and free of charge and the property in this free deed is transferred to you free of charge and given to you with full rights.

The said settlement shall be enjoyed freely by your children and grandchildren from the entire settlement with all the rights of donation. Any objections to this settlement, whether from whomsoever they may be, shall be dismissed at my own expense and I shall grant this settlement to you or your heirs. or my heirs and successors. I hereby declare that the Scheduled Property is free and clear from any mortgages, charges, liens or other encumbrances. I shall be liable to all action taken against me if you come to know of any such occurrences. The Scheduled Property is not subject to the provisions of Shri A.P.G.'s Act No. 9/77. The Scheduled Property has not been assigned by Shri A.P.G. It is hereby certified that there are no gardens, mines or other structures on the land transferred under this deed. If you find that such facts have been concealed, you I am liable for all the actions of the Government. The Scheduled Assets are hereby transferred in your name for the purpose of the Government's accounts.

boundaries.boundaryW: Site settled and registered by me in favour of Karri Baburao

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 1695 of 2006 dated 13/Mar/2006, executed by Karri Tatabbai in favour of his son Karri Satyanarayana, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 113 Sq.Yds, bearing house number 15-80/7, comprised in survey number 116/3, situated in Undrajavaram Village Gram Panchayat and Mandal, within the District of West Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Tanuku is bounded as follows: North by: 55 fts Site of Karri Baburao South by: 53 fts House site of Executant East by: 18.8 fts Road West by: 18.8 fts Site of Rayavaru Srinu

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note:It is noted that House No. 15-80/7 is described as the schedule property in the schedule of the deed, whereas in the Rule-3 Statement the same house number is described as a nearby house number. The F.I. has to verify the discrepancy proceed further in accordance with internal policy, Further It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number,Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
